response.overview: The 2021 Out100 culminates in the second annual Out100 Virtual Honoree Celebration, hosted by Eureka O'Hara and Shangela. Don't miss an incredible acoustic performance by singer, songwriter, and activist Shea Diamond, plus special appearances by Elvira (Cassandra Peterson), Sara Ramirez, Ciara, and many more! The Out100 is presented by Lexus, with additional support from McDonald's, Gilead, and Outfest.
response.title: Out100 Virtual Celebration
